phone2:
1. Shut off Wi-Fi completely.
2. Set brightness ☼ to max or auto.
3. To avoid the screen going to sleep, set the screen's timeout to 3 minutes or more.
4. Adjust the volume so you can hear well.
phone3:
5. Hold your mobile screen horizontally. If the image doesn’t follow, ensure portrait orientation lock is off. ↺
6. Put the browser in fullscreen mode:
   iPhone: If tabs and the address bar are visible at the top: Tap the button with an arrow in the middle below (Share) and choose “Add to Home Screen”. Then continue from the new icon.
   Android: Double-tap on the screen for fullscreen display.
outro1:
This is the end of the tour of Kvarnbyn.
If you have borrowed equipment, please go and return it now.
If you would like to know more about Kvarnbyn, welcome to Mölndals Stadsmuseum



Want to discover more places in Mölndal? Continue your tour at www.entermolndal.se
